name: Rainy Robot
description:
Week 3 game for my rapid-prototyping class. 

You goal is to reach the exit on the right side of the map. However, it's raining and you are a robot who can't get too wet. You can find power-ups that decrease how fast you gain wetness or move faster. 

Use the arrow keys to move left and right.

Theme: Alone

List of constraints: Must have the color black, Player only moves left & right.
